pr_title: Register classes necessary for BV - ORM integration for reflection

timeline.bodyText: Good point, but bear in mind that I plan to disable the org.hibernate.integrator.spi.Integrator SPI, in favour of a Quarkus specific one (I forgot how it's called but it should exist already)
timeline.author: Sanne

replies.bodyText: Hmmm, I don't see any other way to push an integrator right now. In any case, we can easily revisit this when you drop this thing.
replies.author: gsmet

replies.bodyText: Sure, was just meant to remind about the plan. I'll adapt this when we get to fully switch - your test will fail for sure, so I won't forget :)
replies.author: Sanne

timeline.message: Only integrate with Bean Validation if the HV extension is present
